name: drag-race-fantasy
description: You need Facebook to use VH1's. You'll need whiskey to use this.
author: Kim Thompson

scripts.data:clean: rm ~/Downloads/Drag\ Race\ Draft\ -\ Scoreboard.csv ~/Downloads/Drag\ Race\ Draft\ -\ Log.csv
scripts.data:format: csvtojson ~/Downloads/Drag\ Race\ Draft\ -\ Scoreboard.csv > src/data/leaderboard.json && csvtojson ~/Downloads/Drag\ Race\ Draft\ -\ Log.csv > src/data/log.json && npm run data:clean
